programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: While Tristan struggles with Supreme Pacific's scandal, Chesca's kidnapping, and Angelo's worsening condition, the del Mars rejoice as Waldo fulfills his dream of becoming a full-fledged engineer. Soon, Waldo meets his big boss.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Tension rises between Tiago and Marcial after Corazon confronted the former regarding Arabelle's death. Seeing the pain Tiago caused his wife, Marcial vows to do whatever it takes to take him down. Rhian then asks Tiago to leave the de Leons' fundraising event.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: After digging deeper into Marcial and Tiago's conflict, Rhian returns to Barrio Santo Francisco to clear her thoughts. She then reveals her family background to Isabelle. Despite the threat of bankruptcy, Corazon is determined to keep all branches of Arabella's open.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Unable to contain his curiosity, Carlos decides to confront his wife about her suspicious actions. However, Daniela refuses to budge and continues to feign innocence. Meanwhile, Robert pulls some strings in order to prevent Alvin from getting anywhere near his daughter. Cassie, on the other hand, becomes the laughing stock of her class due to a rumor circulating at school. An unsettling discovery prompts Romina to question her husband's intentions.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Cassie fails to restrain her anger after finding out Robert’s plan to get rid of Alvin. However, her rage quickly turns into horror as she witnesses another side of her father she has never seen before. The students of Maxwell continue to ridicule the young Mondragons. Sick of all the bullying, Kristoff decides to put an end to his classmates' childish actions. Marga, on the other hand, carries on with her facade and pretends that she still has everything under control.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: Maila and Ben dig deeper into Rigor and Victoria's past. Fearing their secret will be exposed, Victoria urges Rigor to keep his distance for now. Rigor tries to dispel suspicions by showing he’s a changed man. Meanwhile, Roman plans Victoria's birthday celebration, and Carlos aims to introduce Bianca and Gabriel as the energy couple.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: Unbeknownst to Bianca, Maila and Ben continue investigating Rigor. They meet his former coach and confront Victoria about their discovery. Meanwhile, Roman obtains Gabriel's birth certificate. Bianca and Gabriel are introduced as Tiger Shark’s newest endorsers. To Carlos’ surprise, Roman arrives at the press launch to speak with Gabriel.

programme.title: Bride for Rent
programme.desc: A young bachelor who is trying to get his inheritance hires a woman to act as his pseudo wife, but things get unexpectedly real between the two.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Thanks to Jenna's meddling, Tristan's transaction with the kidnappers fails. To protect his family, Tristan moves Aryann and Angelo somewhere safer. Meanwhile, Waldo deals with office politics.

programme.desc: While Tristan struggles with Supreme Pacific's scandal, Chesca's kidnapping, and Angelo's worsening condition, the del Mars rejoice as Waldo fulfills his dream of becoming a full-fledged engineer. Soon, Waldo meets his big boss.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Through the years, Robert has developed a great working relationship with his secretary, Romina. This does not sit well with Robert’s daughter, Daniela, who doubts the assistant’s true intentions. Things take a turn for the worse when Daniela discovers that her old flame is Romina’s current boyfriend.

programme.title: Bride for Rent

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: An unfortunate event befalls Anna and Paco as their trip comes to an end. Deciding to get one step ahead, Jacob starts to uncover Sonya and Paco's real intentions.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: Sonya finds herself at wit's end as she tries to keep the Lomostes away from her family. To make matters worse, Paco insists on pursuing a law career under Atty. Vega's mentorship.

programme.title: The Last Five Years
programme.desc: Having been together for almost five years, Joan expects William to pop the question. They love each other. They live together. Marriage is the only thing that's missing. But for William, it's the hardest to give.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Cassandra forms an unlikely friendship with Val and Agnes when they find out they’re being cheated on by the same man. Then, Cassandra is deceived again by a man who leaves her pregnant with Iris. Iris grows up helping her mother until Cassandra meets and marries Oliver, whom she explains to Iris as the man guaranteed by certain signs. Years later, Iris experiences these signs with her best friend, Ali.
